name: Electronics
description: Comprehensive category for all electronic devices, including computers, mobile devices, audio equipment, and home entertainment systems.

name: Computers
description: Desktop computers, laptops, workstations, and computer components including processors, graphics cards, and memory modules.

name: Mobile Devices
description: Smartphones, tablets, smartwatches, and related mobile accessories and communication devices.

name: Home Appliances
description: Kitchen appliances, cleaning equipment, climate control devices, and other household electrical machines.

name: Kitchen Appliances
description: Cooking equipment, refrigeration units, small countertop appliances, and food preparation tools.

name: Cleaning Equipment
description: Vacuum cleaners, steam mops, robotic cleaners, and other home cleaning and maintenance devices.

name: Clothing
description: Apparel and fashion items for men, women, and children, including seasonal and everyday wear.

name: Men's Clothing
description: Shirts, pants, suits, casual wear, and accessories specifically designed for men.

name: Women's Clothing
description: Dresses, blouses, skirts, professional attire, and fashion accessories for women.

name: Sports & Outdoors
description: Athletic equipment, outdoor gear, fitness accessories, and recreational products for various sports and activities.

name: Fitness Equipment
description: Gym machines, weights, exercise mats, cardio equipment, and personal training accessories.

name: Outdoor Gear
description: Camping equipment, hiking gear, tents, sleeping bags, navigation tools, and adventure accessories.
